name: NEW! Devour Books
description: - 8.5" by 11" print - Open edition - Signed by artist Erica Sirotich - Giclee printed on fine archival textured stock in San Francisco - Ships USPS First Class Mail in a protective sleeve - Allow up to one week preparation before shipping Frame in a standard 8.5" by 11" frame or a larger frame fitted with an 8.5" by 11" mat. name: Merry Reindeer Card
description: Illustration by Erica Sirotich. - Card size: 4.13" by 5.82" (when folded) - Blank inside - White envelope included - Thick, 16 pt stock coated with a light satin finish - Interior is uncoated for ease of writing - Printed on FSC certified stock in the USA Also available in a set of eight cards here.

name: NEW! Pile o' Ponies
description: - Two print sizes available: 8.5" by 11" and 11" by 14" - Open edition - Titled and signed by artist - Giclee printed on fine archival textured stock in San Francisco - Ships USPS First Class Mail in a protective sleeve - Allow up to one week preparation before shipping When cared for properly and displayed under glass & out of direct sunlight, giclee prints can remain colorfast and beautiful for one hundred years or more.

name: Happy Birthday Gators Card
description: Turns out everyone you know will be having a birthday in the next 365 days! Might as well be ready for them! Send a card sporting a happy pack of gators to the next birthday boy or girl in your life. Illustrated with cheer by Erica Sirotich. - Card size: 4.13" by 5.82" (when folded) - Blank inside - White envelope included - Thick, 16 pt stock coated with a light satin finish - Interior is uncoated for ease of writing - Printed on FSC certified stock in the USA

name: Thinking of You Card
description: Sometimes really special people aren't nearby when you're thinking about them. Tell them they're on your mind with this sweet card illustrated by Erica Sirotich. - Card size: 4.13" by 5.82" (when folded) - Blank inside - White envelope included - Thick, 16 pt stock coated with a light satin finish - Interior is uncoated for ease of writing - Printed on FSC certified stock in the USA

name: Thank You Bunny Card
description: Sometimes you're so grateful for someone you want to wave a sign in front of their house! Perhaps instead you can just send them this card, illustrated with love by Erica Sirotich. - Card size: 4.13" by 5.82" (when folded) - Blank inside - White envelope included - Thick, 16 pt stock coated with a light satin finish - Interior is uncoated for ease of writing - Printed on FSC certified stock in the USA

name: Thank You Fox Card
description: There are lots of things to be thankful for, especially foxes and chocolate ice cream cones. Show someone special your appreciation with this sweet card illustrated by Erica Sirotich. - Card size: 4.13" by 5.82" (when folded) - Blank inside - White envelope included - Thick, 16 pt stock coated with a light satin finish - Interior is uncoated for ease of writing - Printed on FSC certified stock in the USA

name: Miss You Card
description: A sweet full color card to send to someone you're longing to see, illustrated with love by Erica Sirotich. - Card size: 4.13" by 5.82" (when folded) - Blank inside - White envelope included - Thick, 16 pt stock coated with a light satin finish - Interior is uncoated for ease of writing - Printed on FSC certified stock in the USA

name: Welcome Little One Card

description: So many occasions call for congratulations--a graduation, wedding, retirement, a new home, new baby, new job, new pony! Say it with this happy card illustrated by Erica Sirotich. - Card size: 4.13" by 5.82" (when folded) - Blank inside - White envelope included - Thick, 16 pt stock coated with a light satin finish - Interior is uncoated for ease of writing - Printed on FSC certified stock in the USA

name: Happy Birthday Dogs Card
description: A dachshund meets his doppelgänger on his birthday... how very exciting! Send that birthday boy or girl a double dose of well wishes with this card illustrated by Erica Sirotich. - Card size: 4.13" by 5.82" (when folded) - Blank inside - White envelope included - Thick, 16 pt stock coated with a light satin finish - Interior is uncoated for ease of writing - Printed on FSC certified stock in the USA

name: You Captivate Me Card

This card was inspired by the fifteenth century Hunt of the Unicorn tapestry and was illustrated with love by Erica Sirotich. - Card size: 4.13" by 5.82" (when folded) - Blank inside - White envelope included - Thick, 16 pt stock coated with a light satin finish - Interior is uncoated for ease of writing - Printed on FSC certified stock in the USA

name: All Occassion Card Bundle
description: Stock up on greetings in one fell swoop! Get nine cards to send to nine lucky friends (or one REALLY lucky friend) and save a few pennies in the process! Bundle includes: - Thank You Fox - Thank You Bunny - Miss You Bunny - Thinking of You Bear - Happy Birthday Dogs - Happy Birthday Gators - Congratulatory Pony - You Captivate Me Unicorn - Welcome Little One Chick - Card size: 4.13" by 5.82" (when folded) - Blank inside - White envelopes included - Thick, 16 pt stock coated with a light satin finish - Interior is uncoated for ease of writing - Printed on FSC certified stock in the USA Bundles are shipped to you via USPS Priority Mail so you'll be sending greetings in no time! Note: Bundle DOES NOT include the Merry Reindeer holiday card or any letterpress products.

name: Merry Reindeer Card Bundle
description: Perhaps, this year, you would like to wish everyone you know a Merry Christmas with a chubby reindeer! Get eight (8) Merry Reindeer cards, illustrated with love and cheer by Erica Sirotich, with this festive card bundle. - Card size: 4.13" by 5.82" (when folded) - Blank inside - White envelopes included - Thick, 16 pt stock coated with a light satin finish - Interior is uncoated for ease of writing - Printed on FSC certified stock in the USA Bundles are shipped to you via USPS Priority Mail so you'll be sending holiday greetings in no time! Also available as a single card here.

name: Let's Read (Limited Edition)
description: Inspire a child to read with this charming print of the original "Bibliobears" illustration by Erica Sirotich. Perfect for a child's room, library, play room or any other cozy place to curl up with a good book. "Let's Read" is now available in four colors--mustard yellow, salmon red, lilac and pale blue. Select your favorite in the drop down box below when ordering. This print is oriented horizontally and includes a generous white border. This ensures that artist's signature and edition number will be visible when print is framed. - 11" by 14" print - Available in four colors - Limited edition of 200 (50 of each color) - Titled, numbered and signed by artist Erica Sirotich - Giclee printed on fine archival textured stock in San Francisco - Ships USPS First Class Mail in a protective sleeve - Allow up to one week preparation before shipping Frame in a standard 11" by 14" frame or a larger frame fitted with an 11" by 14" mat. When cared for properly and displayed under glass & out of direct sunlight, giclee prints can remain colorfast and beautiful for one hundred years or more.

name: Let's Read (Open Edition)
description: Now available in a petite open edition, the Bibliobears can't wait to cozy up with a book in your reading nook! "Let's Read" is available in three colors--mustard yellow, salmon red and pale blue. Select your favorite in the drop down box below when ordering. This print is oriented vertically and includes a generous white border. This ensures that artist's signature will be visible when print is framed. - 8.5" by 11" print - Available in three colors, each featuring a different Bibliobear - Open edition - Signed by artist Erica Sirotich - Giclee printed on fine archival textured stock in San Francisco - Ships USPS First Class Mail in a protective sleeve - Allow up to one week preparation before shipping Frame in a standard 8.5" by 11" frame or a larger frame fitted with an 8.5" by 11" mat. When cared for properly and displayed under glass & out of direct sunlight, giclee prints can remain colorfast and beautiful for one hundred years or more.

name: Quilliam's Cactuses
description: Quilliam Pincraft is an ordinary hedgehog who farms cactuses for a living. Perhaps you have a few growing at home for Quilliam to tend? This verdant print will liven up any room you plant it in, whether or not you have a green thumb! This print is oriented vertically and includes a generous white border, allowing flexibility in framing. - Two print sizes available: 8.5" by 11" and 11" by 14" - Open edition - Titled and signed by artist - Giclee printed on fine archival textured stock in San Francisco - Ships USPS First Class Mail in a protective sleeve - Allow up to one week preparation before shipping Frame in a standard-sized frame (8.5" x 11" or 11" x 14") or a larger frame fitted with a mat cut to print size. When cared for properly and displayed under glass & out of direct sunlight, giclee prints can remain colorfast and beautiful for one hundred years or more.

name: Fish Socks
description: Brighten up any wall with these adventurous little fellas! The original "Fish Socks" illustration by Erica Sirotich appeared in the British illustration magazine Ammo in Fall, 2011. This print is oriented horizontally and includes a generous white border, allowing flexibility in framing (details below). - 11" by 8.5" print with 8.5" by 5.5" image area - Limited edition of 200 - Titled, numbered and signed by artist - Giclee printed on fine archival textured stock in San Francisco - Ships USPS First Class Mail in a protective sleeve - Allow up to one week preparation before shipping When cared for properly and displayed under glass & out of direct sunlight, giclee prints can remain colorfast and beautiful for one hundred years or more.

name: Living California (New!)
description: I moved to California one year ago and quickly discovered how much Californians love their state. For good reason--it's one of the most beautiful places I've ever been! Being from southwest Florida, though, where even the most residential areas are crawling with armadillos and gators and giant woodpeckers and salamanders--I've been feeling a bit of critter withdrawal lately. Living right in the middle of San Francisco, my most typical creature encounter is with a pigeon. So I decided to do some investigating to get to know the wildlife of the state I now call home. What an incredible diversity of animals live here! I created the Living California map for the native and transplant Californians who love their home and the animal friends they share it with. This 13" by 19" giclee print is created in a limited editon of 200 and printed on heavyweight archival paper. The print is oriented vertically and includes a generous white border. This ensures that artist's signature and edition number will be visible when print is framed. - 13" by 19" print - Limited edition of 200 - Titled, numbered and signed by artist Erica Sirotich - Giclee printed on fine archival textured stock in San Francisco - Ships flat via USPS Priority Mail in a rigid protective sleeve - Allow up to one week preparation before shipping Frame in a standard 13" by 19" frame or a larger frame fitted with an 13" by 19" mat. When cared for properly and displayed under glass & out of direct sunlight, giclee prints can remain colorfast and beautiful for one hundred years or more.

name: Shrimp Shadow (Now Bigger!)
description: Get your salty hands on this limited edition print of original illustration "Shrimp Shadow" by illustrator Erica Sirotich! Vikings on a whale! First released as an 8.5" by 11" print (now sold out!), "Shrimp Shadow" is now available in two larger sizes that really allow the detail in this piece to shine. Choose your preferred size in the drop down box below. - Two sizes available: 11" by 17" and 13" by 19" - Limited edition of 100 (each size) - Titled, numbered and signed by artist - Giclee printed on fine archival textured stock in San Francisco - Ships USPS Priority Mail in a protective sleeve - Allow up to one week preparation before shipping Frame in a standard 11" by 17" or 13" by 19" poster frame or a larger frame fitted with a mat cut to the print's size. When cared for properly and displayed under glass & out of direct sunlight, giclee prints can remain colorfast and beautiful for one hundred years or more.

name: Custom House Portrait
description: Our homes are places like none other, laden with memories of family, children and friends. A custom portrait of your current or childhood home, a grandparents' home, the summer cabin--what could be more special? I recently had the opportunity to draw my own house in San Francisco through a commission from my neighbors upstairs, and was immediately hooked. I'd love to draw your house too. - Order includes up to three 11" x 14" or 13" x 19" prints - Includes a web resolution file that you can share with friends* - Hand-titled with your family name or home address - Hand-signed & dated by the artist - Giclee printed on fine archival textured stock in San Francisco - Ships flat via USPS First Class Mail in a rigid protective sleeve - Allow up to three weeks preparation before shipping Custom Illustration Process Once you place your order, Erica will contact you by email to collect house reference photos and discuss details that should appear in the illustration (for instance, a pet's head peeking out from the window). The print will be oriented portrait or landscape depending on your house's layout and colored using a palette true to your home's. The portrait may include some landscape elements but will appear on a simple solid colored background. You will have the opportunity to review and approve the illustration at the sketch stage and the color stage. No more than two rounds of revisions permitted. The entire process, from commission to shipment, should take no longer than three weeks. If you require faster turnaround, please contact Erica before ordering. Care & Display Frame your print in a standard 11" by 14" or 13" by 19" frame or a larger frame fitted with a mat cut to size. When cared for properly and displayed under glass & out of direct sunlight, giclee prints can remain colorfast and beautiful for one hundred years or more. *This pricing is applicable only to portraits commissioned for personal uses. Print resolution files are not included but additional prints of your portrait can be ordered from Cuddlefish Press. For commercial use of commissioned images, please contact Erica directly for a quote.

name: Open Sesame
description:
Invite this sweet group of mermaids and their sea-dwelling friends into your home with this limited edition print of an original illustration by Erica Sirotich. Great for a little girl's room, nursery or any other bright, happy place! 

This print is oriented vertically and includes a generous white border. This ensures that artist's signature and edition number will be visible when print is framed. 

- 11" by 14" print
- Limited edition of 200
- Titled, numbered and signed by artist
- Giclee printed on fine archival textured stock in San Francisco
- Ships flat via USPS First Class Mail in a rigid protective sleeve
- Allow up to one week preparation before shipping

Frame in a standard 11" by 14" frame or a larger frame fitted with an 11" by 14" mat. When cared for properly and displayed under glass & out of direct sunlight, giclee prints can remain colorfast and beautiful for one hundred years or more.

name: Yarn Monster
description: Meet Yarnold the Yarn Monster! He would like to become friends... with your cats, please. This print of an original illustration by Erica Sirotich was designed to delight knitters, cat lovers, crafters, kids and other folks just like you. The print includes a generous white border. This ensures that artist's signature and edition number will be visible when framed. - 11" by 14" print with border - Limited edition of 200 - Titled, numbered and signed by artist - Giclee printed on fine archival textured stock in San Francisco - Ships USPS First Class Mail in a protective sleeve - Allow up to one week preparation before shipping When cared for properly and displayed under glass & out of direct sunlight, giclee prints can remain colorfast and beautiful for one hundred years or more.

name: Sleepy Heap Wood
description:
There's a nook in the forest called Sleepy Heap Wood where animals snuggle under moonbeams and the buzz of bumblebees. This print of an original illustration by Erica Sirotich was designed to inspire by adorning the wall of a child's room or nursery. - 11" by 14" print with border - Limited edition of 200 - Titled, numbered and signed by artist - Giclee printed on fine archival textured stock in San Francisco - Ships USPS First Class Mail in a protective sleeve - Allow up to one week preparation before shipping When cared for properly and displayed under glass & out of direct sunlight, giclee prints can remain colorfast and beautiful for one hundred years or more.

Personalization Options

This print may be personalized with a hand-lettered name or special message in the yellow banner beneath the bumblebees. Choose the personalized option in the drop down box below and provide personalization details in the comments section of the payment form. Please limit the name or message to approximately 15 characters. You will receive an email confirming your personalized message once you place your order. Please allow up to two weeks preparation time for lettering and printing before your one of a kind print is shipped.

name: Paper Boat Crew
description:
Sail the high seas on a paper boat with these happy fellas! This print of an original illustration by Erica Sirotich was designed to inspire by adorning the wall of a child's room or nursery. - 11" by 14" print with border - Limited edition of 200 - Titled, numbered and signed by artist - Giclee printed on fine archival textured stock in San Francisco - Ships USPS First Class Mail in a protective sleeve - Allow up to one week preparation before shipping When cared for properly and displayed under glass & out of direct sunlight, giclee prints can remain colorfast and beautiful for one hundred years or more.

Personalization Options

This print may be personalized with a brief hand-lettered name or special message in the blue banner held up by the baby seal and beluga. Choose the personalized option in the drop down box below and provide personalization details in the comments section of the payment form. Since the banner is small, please limit the name or message to approximately 8-10 characters. You will receive an email confirming your personalized message once you place your order. Please allow up to two weeks preparation time for lettering and printing before your one of a kind print is shipped.

name: Garden Party
description:
Mingle with a colorful and cultivated crowd with this print of an original illustration by Erica Sirotich. "Garden Party" was designed to adorn the wall of a child's room or nursery. - 11" by 14" print with border - Limited edition of 200 - Titled, numbered and signed by artist - Giclee printed on fine archival textured stock in San Francisco - Ships USPS First Class Mail in a protective sleeve - Allow up to one week preparation before shipping When cared for properly and displayed under glass & out of direct sunlight, giclee prints can remain colorfast and beautiful for one hundred years or more.

Personalization Options

This print may be personalized with a hand-lettered name or special message in the green banner under the yellow chickies. Choose the personalized option in the drop down box below and provide personalization details in the comments section of the payment form. Two names or a first and middle name will work beautifully in this illustration, but please limit the name or message to approximately 8-10 characters on either side of the banner. You will receive an email confirming your personalized message once you place your order. Please allow up to two weeks preparation time for lettering and printing before your one of a kind print is shipped.

name: Llama for My Mama
description: This sweet little illustration was made as a gift for my mom, who adores llamas. Lots of people liked it so I recreated it for Cuddlefish Press! A great little gift for any mommy. "Llama for My Mama" is available in two color varieties--with a pink banner and with a green banner. Select your favorite in the drop down box below when ordering. This print is only available unframed at this time. Frame shown as a display example only.

name: Creature Alphabet
description: Each letter in the alphabet built out of creatures! - Two Sizes Available: 11" by 17" and 13" by 19" - Limited edition of 100 - Titled, numbered and signed by artist - Giclee printed on fine archival textured stock in San Francisco - Ships USPS Priority Mail in a protective sleeve - Allow up to one week preparation before shipping When cared for properly and displayed under glass & out of direct sunlight, giclee prints can remain colorfast and beautiful for one hundred years or more.

name: Heraldry Prints (Sale!)
description:
I love medieval heraldry, and reinterpreting it with new characters and layouts. The first shield's inscription reads "Peace and plenty," a motto used by Charles Edward Fair, Esquire of Athlone, county Westmeath, Ireland. The second shield's inscription reads "After sad things, happy ones." This motto appeared on the shield of the Gough of Wilsbury in 1619. Order one or, better yet, get the handsome pair (on sale!) to display above the mantle.  

- 8.5" by 11" prints 
- Limited edition of 50 (of each design)  
- Titled, numbered and signed by artist 
- Giclee printed on fine archival textured stock in San Francisco 
- Ships USPS First Class Mail in a protective sleeve 
- Allow up to one week preparation before shipping

name: Mulberry Bush
description: A sophisticated interpretation of a classic nursery rhyme, printed in letterpress. Perfect to adorn the wall of a child's room, nursery or other happy space. - 8.5" by 11" letterpress print - Limited edition of 50 - Titled, numbered and signed by artist - Letterpress printed on fine archival cotton stock in San Francisco - Ships flat via USPS First Class Mail in a rigid protective sleeve

name: Pack of Cats
description: Who needs wallpaper? The beginning and end of this cat tale are up to your imagination. A great conversation starter for kids and cat lovers alike. (I like to think the mouse got away!) This quirky limited edition print is oriented horizontally and includes a generous white border. This ensures that artist's signature and edition number will be visible when print is framed. - Two sizes available - 11" x 17" (open edition) - 13" x 19" (limited edition of 100) - Titled, numbered and signed by artist - Giclee printed on fine archival textured stock in San Francisco - Ships USPS Priority Mail in a protective sleeve -Allow up to one week preparation before shipping Frame in a standard 11" by 17" or 13" by 19" frame or a larger frame fitted with a mat cut to size. When cared for properly and displayed under glass & out of direct sunlight, giclee prints can remain colorfast and beautiful for one hundred years or more.

name: How to Dress a Turkey (Sale!)
description: I am a vegetarian and have never dressed a turkey. I made this little infographic for newbs like me! Bring a bit of humor to Thanksgiving dinner with this print of an original illustration from Cuddlefish Press. - 8.5" by 11" print - Open edition - Signed by artist Erica Sirotich - Giclee printed on fine archival textured stock in San Francisco - Ships USPS First Class Mail in a protective sleeve Because this print is a seasonal open edition it is a bit less expensive than Cuddlefish Press's limited (numbered) edition prints! Still hand-signed by the artist, still special. When cared for properly and displayed under glass & out of direct sunlight, giclee prints can remain colorfast and beautiful for one hundred years or more.

name: Snow Day (Sale!)
description: Though I've spent my entire adult life in the snow-free climates of Florida and California, I did live in Buffalo, New York as a girl and fondly remember the excitement that came with the announcement of a snow day! This print celebrates those days, when too much snow meant staying home from school, bundling up in a snowsuit, making snowmen and building igloos, and then warming up inside with a cup of hot cocoa. - 8.5" by 11" print - Open edition - Signed by artist Erica Sirotich - Giclee printed on fine archival textured stock in San Francisco - Ships USPS First Class Mail in a protective sleeve Because this print is a seasonal open edition it is a bit less expensive than Cuddlefish Press's limited (numbered) edition prints! Still hand-signed by the artist, still special. Ready to mat and frame. When cared for properly and displayed under glass & out of direct sunlight, giclee prints can remain colorfast and beautiful for one hundred years or more.

name: Pick Me Up Letterpress Card, #1
description: Everyone needs a pick me up once in a while! This little card is letterpress printed with an uplifting little fella and corresponding message. Perfect to remind a child or friend that they can tackle just about anything! - One card and matching aqua envelope - Letterpress printed on French Paper's Whip Cream cover stock - 4 Bar size (3 5/8" by 4 5/8"), the smallest mailable card in the US! - Blank inside - Printed by hand in San Francisco, California

name: Pick Me Up Letterpress Card, #2
description: Everyone needs a pick me up once in a while! This little card is letterpress printed with an uplifting little fella and corresponding message. Perfect to remind a child or friend that sunnier skies are right around the corner. Choose design in aqua or pink. - One card and matching aqua or pink envelope - Letterpress printed on French Paper's Whip Cream cover stock - 4 Bar size (3 5/8" by 4 5/8"), the smallest mailable card in the US! - Blank inside - Printed by hand in San Francisco, California

name: Pick Me Up Letterpress Cards, Set
description: Everyone needs a pick me up once in a while! Each of these cards is letterpress printed with an uplifting little fella and corresponding message. Perfect to remind a child or friend that they're awesome, or help them get through a difficult day. Cards included: - You are the Best - So Proud of You! - You can do it! - Tomorrow will be better - Set of four cards and matching envelopes - Letterpress printed on French Paper's Whip Cream cover stock - Each design in a different color (warm red, aqua, apple green and pink) - 4 Bar size (3 5/8" by 4 5/8"), the smallest mailable card in the US! - Blank inside - Printed by hand in San Francisco, California

name: Bibliobears Mini Letterpress Cards
description: When I was a little girl my mom used to slip little notes into my lunchbox. These notes, adorned with little drawings and words of encouragement or praise, always made my day. Though many years ago, I still think of them (thanks mommy)! So I decided to make these little tiny note cards to help you surprise that special person in your life. This collection of six sweet mini note cards was letterpress printed by hand using a tabletop Chandler & Price press in my San Francisco studio. Printed with Cuddlefish Press's three classic "Bibliobears" in chocolate brown rubber-based ink on French Paper's Speckletone Oatmeal and Pop-Tone Whip Cream cover stock. Set of six 2.5" by 3.5" cards includes three kraft cards and three white cards, each sporting one of three Bibliobears designs. Blank inside so you can personalize with your own special message. Six matching chocolate brown envelopes are included. Because these cards are too small to send through the USPS, it's better to tuck them under a pillow, inside a lunchbox or into a pocket.

name: Foxy Mini Letterpress Cards
description: When I was a little girl my mom used to slip notes into my lunchbox. These notes, adorned with little drawings and words of encouragement or praise, always made my day. Though many years ago, I still think of them (thanks mommy)! So I decided to make these tiny note cards to help you surprise that special person in your life. - Set of four mini cards and matching envelopes - Sweet symmetrical fox design - Letterpress printed on French Paper's Oatmeal cover stock - Warm red ink - 2.5" by 3.5" when folded - Blank inside - Printed by hand in San Francisco, California Because these cards are too small to send through the USPS, it's better to tuck them under a pillow, inside a lunchbox or into a pocket.

name: Owly Mini Letterpress Cards
description: When I was a little girl my mom used to slip notes into my lunchbox. These notes, adorned with little drawings and words of encouragement or praise, always made my day. name: Little Girls Mini Letterpress Cards
description: When I was a little girl my mom used to slip notes into my lunchbox. These notes, adorned with little drawings and words of encouragement or praise, always made my day. Though many years ago, I still think of them (thanks mommy)! So I decided to make these tiny note cards to help you surprise that special person in your life. - Set of four mini cards and matching envelopes - Sweet symmetrical girl design - Letterpress printed on French Paper's Whip Cream cover stock - Warm red ink - 2.5" by 3.5" when folded - Blank inside - Printed by hand in San Francisco, California Because these cards are too small to send through the USPS, it's better to tuck them under a pillow, inside a lunchbox or into a pocket.

name: Llama Mini Letterpress Cards
description: When I was a little girl my mom used to slip notes into my lunchbox. These notes, adorned with little drawings and words of encouragement or praise, always made my day. Though many years ago, I still think of them (thanks mommy)! So I decided to make these tiny note cards to help you surprise that special person in your life. - Set of four mini cards and matching envelopes - Sweet symmetrical llama design - Letterpress printed on French Paper's Whip Cream cover stock - Chocolate brown ink - 2.5" by 3.5" when folded - Blank inside - Printed by hand in San Francisco, California Because these cards are too small to send through the USPS, it's better to tuck them under a pillow, inside a lunchbox or into a pocket.

name: Bibliobears Ex Libris Clear Stamp
description: The Bibliobears love books and would like to help you personalize your library! Choose from one of three stamp designs, or order all three for a complete set. NEW! The Bibliobears stamps have been recreated with the traditional Ex Libris caption "This book belongs to." Only limited quantities of the previous stamp designs are available. Please indicate which design you would like in the dropdown box below when ordering. Created from clear photopolymer and designed to cling to an acrylic mount for stamping. One mount (sold separately, see options below) may be used for all three stamps. May be used with any type of stamping ink. Instructions for use included. Your stamp will be shipped via USPS First Class Mail in a padded mailer. Please allow up to one week for preparation before shipping.

options.name: "Tell Me a Story"  w/ Acrylic Mount
"This Book Belongs to" (hat bear) w/ Mount
"This Book Belongs to" (glasses bear) w/ Mount
"This Book Belongs to" (hair bear) w/ Mount
